description:
Naruto and his squad start their first ninja missions with boring and menial tasks. Weary and angry, Naruto vents his frustration at the Hokage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dangerous Mission! Journey to the Land of Waves!
Gefährliche Mission! Die Reise ins Reich der Wellen
Juuyou Ninmu! Nami no Kuni e Chou Shuppatsu!
Niebezpieczna misja! Podróż do Krainy Fal!
ภารกิจสำคัญมุ่งสู่นามิโนะคุนิ
重要任務! 波の国へ超出発!
